citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
Item Veterinary Care 2.33 b 5
At the time of inspection outdated drugs were found in an investigator surgery to include dobutamine exp Apr 1,
2015, Atropine exp 12/14, Metoprolol exp 5/1/15, diltiazem exp Aug 1, 2012, Potassium Acetate exp June 1 2015,
Metoprolol exp exp 10/14, Solu Medrol exp 5/2014, Cefazolin exp 2/15
The use of outdated drugs is not proper veterinary care. In addition IACUC needs to be more vigilant during its
semi annual inspection.
Facility needs to review its guidelines concerning proper use drugs with its investigators.
Correct from this day 8/13/15

Item Annual Report 2.36 a
At the time of inspection the annual report for the facility was reviewed and the report that was submitted to the
USDA was incomplete. It did not contain all the types of animals used nor did it contain the numbers of animals
used.
The facility needs to submit an amended annual report with the correct type of animals and numbers of animals and
include any approved exceptions if applicable.
Correct by 8/20/15
Inspection took place over 2 days 8/12-13/15
Exit interview took place at the end of inspection with facility
